title: Getting the firewall message after getting DC'd
body: Got the "Reconnecting"  message in game that lasted over 2 mins. Quit the game to reload and am now being spammed with the firewall retry error message. Anyone else experiencing this? Would prefer not to get banned for something I can't prevent

replies.body: Got the same thing, my entire game just disappeared from my match history as well :p
if your client wont re-open try ending all league processes(task manager, processes) usually works for me
